mapper.select: SELECT tmrf.fk_role_id as role_id,tmmf.id as fun_id,tmmf.fun_name,tmmf.method as fun_method,tmmf.url as fun_url,tmmf.fk_menu_id as menu_id,tmm.menu_name,tmm.url as menu_url,tmm.fk_parent_id as menu_parent_id,tmms.menu_name as menu_parent_name FROM dms.tb_manager_role_fun tmrf LEFT JOIN dms.tb_manager_menu_fun tmmf ON tmrf.fk_fun_id=tmmf.id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_manager_menu tmm ON tmmf.fk_menu_id=tmm.id and tmm.isdeleted=0 LEFT JOIN dms.tb_manager_menu tmms ON tmms.id=tmm.fk_parent_id and tmms.isdeleted=0 WHERE fk_role_id =#{fk_role_id}
